analysisParams.promptTemplate: You are an analyst who specializes in summarizing social media content. Provide a concise summary of the main topics, themes, and sentiments in these tweets.

promptUsed.system: You are an analyst who specializes in summarizing social media content. Provide a concise summary of the main topics, themes, and sentiments in these tweets.
promptUsed.user:
Please analyze these tweets from @mashbean｜豆泥｜ドゥに｜도니 and provide a summary of what they mainly talked about in the past week:

Some thought after attending @ICANN 82 Forum. Thanks to @twnic_ia for the fellowship program~
https://t.co/XWstgGFF9S

@suji_yan 最近才知道吳國光作為趙紫陽文膽，撰寫《政治體制改革總體設想》時也才30歲

summary: The tweets from @mashbean｜豆泥｜ドゥに｜도니 in the past week mainly discussed their thoughts after attending the ICANN 82 Forum and expressed gratitude towards TWNIC for the fellowship program. Additionally, there was a mention about Wu Guoguang, who wrote "Political System Reform Overall Concept" when he was only 30 years old. The overall sentiment appears to be informative and reflective.
